import React, { useState} from "react"; let tempInfo = { "deckTitle": "Rendering in react", "cardTotal": 3, "currentCard": 1, "question": "????????????????????????????", "answer": "Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah ", "flipped": false } const [flip, setflip] = useState(false) const handleFlip = () => setFlip(() => !flip) export default function displayCard(){ if(tempInfo.cardTotal <= 2){ return (

Not enough cards.

You need at least 3 cards to study. There are {tempInfo.cardTotal}

) } if(tempInfo.flipped === false){ return ( <>

{tempInfo.deckTitle}: Study

Card {tempInfo.currentCard} of {tempInfo.cardTotal}

{tempInfo.question}

) } return ( <>

{tempInfo.deckTitle}: Study

Card {tempInfo.currentCard} of {tempInfo.cardTotal}

{tempInfo.answer}

) }
